description:
Prime River-End Home Site
Outstanding, fully fenced 614m home site, fully fenced. Prime river end location, northerly aspect, only a short walk to the banks of the Murray River. Generous 18m frontage, all services available.
A prime block in a prime location.
Property Code: 403902096

Great First Home- Bursting with Potential
Represents an excellent opportunity for the first home buyer or smart investor. This spacious home features generous ground floor kitchen/meals area, good size lounge and bedrooms. Full size bathroom. Second upstairs living area opening out to balcony. Two good size bedrooms with BIR's and ceiling fans. Rear patio, carport and 7m x 8m lock-up shed with concrete floor and power. Generous block and a very convenient location. A little TLC will transform this home.
Property Code: 403901717

Location, Location, Location!
This charming older style home has undergone a stunning transformation! Freshly painted internally and with new carpets, new window coverings, new kitchen and a new bathroom, there is nothing left to do but move in. The home features a spacious kitchen/meals area, large lounge and dining area with gas heater and feature open fire place, and three bedrooms, all with built in robes and ceiling fans. The renovated laundry contains a second shower (over bath) and a second toilet. Outside there is a double carport, single brick garage, workshop, sundry shedding and a third toilet. This is a very solid home with lots of old world charm and a superb location, only a short walk to shops, schools, and the hospital. Sited on a 976 square metre block with good colorbond fencing. May be suitable for future development. (STCA)
All the work is done! Ready for you to just move in, or great investment potential - and we have excellent tenants waiting. Call today to arrange your inspection!

As New Family Home ~ Massive Block!
This super stylish twelve month old, four bedroom home is sited on a huge 1235 square metre block and has been thoughtfully (and very beautifully!) designed to suit the whole family. Feature spacious open plan living with stunning kitchen, generous walk in pantry, raked ceiling and sliding doors opening to the fantastic outdoor entertaining area. Separate lounge/retreat adjacent to the second, third and fourth bedrooms, also with outdoor access. Master bedroom with walk in robe and a luxurious ensuite, three other excellent sized bedrooms all with built in robes, and main bathroom with double spa bath and separate powder room. Loads of other special additions such as double glazed windows, ducted heating and cooling throughout, double lock up garage with direct house/yard access and garden shed. Located in one of Cobram's most sought after new subdivisions, the Rivertown Estate. Arrange your inspection today!
Property Code: 403902122

3 BEDROOM BRICK UNIT
This well presented 3 bedroom brick veneer unit is located in a quiet court. Set amongst other quality properties, the home has a very open living plan, 3 good size bedrooms, neat tidy rear yard with garden shedding, and lock up carport. Ideal for the Investor or home owner.

Impressive, Spacious Family Home
This spacious four bedroom home is well built, well designed and bound to impress. It features open plan kitchen/dining/living area, formal lounge, theatre/rumpus room and a separate study. Four spacious bedrooms, main with walk in robe and ensuite with spa bath, and all others with built in robes. Zoned/ducted refrigerated heating and cooling system throughout and a natural gas heater in the living area. Double garage, outdoor undercover entertaining area with a ceiling fan and an adjoined paved area with a shade sail. Landscaped, low maintenance surrounds in a great position close to River Road and Murray River bushland. Don't miss out!

address: 12 Alannah Court, Oasis Village Cobram VIC 3644
description:
Retirement Lifestyle
• Best Retirement Park in Victoria
• 3 Bedrooms, 2 split systems, open living plan, and carpet
• Neat and tidy, garden shedding, ideal retirement home

Renovated Family Home ~ River End Location
Appealing three bedroom home sited on a generous 921 square metre block in a prime river end location, only a few minutes walk to the Murray River. Beautifully renovated inside and out, with an open plan living area, well appointed kitchen with quality appliances, lounge with French doors opening to the front balcony and a feature wood heater. Good size bedrooms, fully renovated bathroom, second separate toilet, ducted cooling and gas heating and appealing Murray Pine floors. Patio/barbecue area, garden shed and established surrounds. All the character and charm of a traditional home with the modern comforts. Don't miss out!
Property Code: 403902098

So much accommodation in the perfect location
If you need accommodation for the growing family, then you can not go past this 4BR double storey home, positioned within a two minute stroll of bushland. Walking in the front door, you are greeted with timber staircase and balustrading. To the left is a sunken lounge room which has slate flooring and soaring cathedral ceilings and has a feature brick fireplace with coonara like wood burner. To the right, there is a second living area which can be closed off, making it ideal for a home theatre or a games room. Towards the back of the home is the timber kitchen which overlooks the meals family area. The kitchen offers plenty of cupboard space, wall oven, cooktop and dishwasher. This home even has a bonus enclosed jacuzzi area with retreat, although not in current working condition, this area could be reworked to make a fantastic outdoor entertaining area. The 4th bedroom is also located downstairs and has a semi ensuite. Upstairs, there is another three bedrooms all with BIRs. The master bedroom comprises two way bathroom with step up tiled podiums to the bath and shower. There is also storage hidden into the roof space cavity. Externally the garage can accommodate up to 4 vehicles and there is a generous shed to the rear yard. This home has so much potential and needs to be inspected to appreciate what this home has to offer.
